## Peer-graded Assignment: R Markdown and Leaflet


```{r, echo=FALSE}

library(leaflet)

my_map <- leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lat=28.3748998, lng=-81.5494264, 
             popup="Epcot at Walt Disney World")
my_map

```
